INTRODUCTION.HEADING: Let's work together
INTRODUCTION.BIO: I'm a passionate frontend developer originally from Paris, now living in Hessen close to Frankfurt, Germany. I enjoy using various technologies to build amazing products and focusing on solving problems for different industries and niches. I'm also interested in AI, automation, and project management.
INTRODUCTION.CONTACT_INTRO: I would love to hear from you. Whether it is a project, job opportunity, or just a chat.

PROJECTS.TITLE: My Projects
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: These projects showcase my expertise in frontend development, AI integration, and automation. Each project demonstrates different skills and modern web technologies.

PROJECT_JOIN.TITLE: Join
PROJECT_JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. A collaborative project management tool with drag-and-drop functionality.

PROJECT_POLLO.TITLE: El Pollo Loco
PROJECT_POLLO.DESCRIPTION: Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Features include character movement, collision detection, and enemy AI.

PROJECT_POKEDEX.TITLE: Pokedex
PROJECT_POKEDEX.DESCRIPTION: Pokedex App using REST API to fetch all Pokemon data from the PokeAPI. Includes search functionality and detailed Pokemon information.
